blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

blog.name: luigiyoshi2210
blog.title: Like my art? You must reconsider XD
blog.description: Super Mario // The Walking Dead Game // Sherlock // Supernatural // Zootopia// Detroit: Become Human // Jess Glynne // Bastille // Mumford & Sons// Gorillaz // Has too many fandoms but draws about two or three of them // Is trying to focus on the ones I have right now before I like something else // Likes throwing my precious bois into some fandoms and makes a lot of crossovers // Luigi and Yoshi are the best // Light-hearted but also dark, obsessed with gay and can force it on any character I wish (uhhh)

blog.name: kokorothedoll
blog.title: ~Totally not a demon~
blog.description:
((Dragon or Marie - 21 - May 29th - Gemini - Female - Self Taught Artist)) Hello I'm just a 21 year old nerd who lives in the US and loves nothing more than to draw and make art..
Totally isn't a demon that stole Dragon's computer and locked her in a closet. owo

summary:
Dang, I had this in my unfinished drawing stash for god knows how long.. >.> 


Enough of that though, so when It came out I had...
caption:
Dang, I had this in my unfinished drawing stash for god knows how long.. >.>

Enough of that though, so when It came out I had a blast with the Octo expansion dlc in Splatoon 2, not to mention I enjoyed a lot of the soundtrack as well~ Out of curiosity I looked into lore of the character who apparently was the one to make the songs; DJ Dedf1sh, I have to admit I had a pretty big tear in my heart after reading into the info about her. ; w ;

DA Account: https://www.deviantart.com/sapphirethewolfdemon

blog.name: slowstrollthroughjapan
blog.title: A Slow Stroll Through Japan
blog.description: To relive the trip and share pictures I've decided to create this tumblr. It's set to auto-update a few pictures each day, and since I took over 3,000 pictures I thought it'd be a fun way of sharing and reminiscing about the trip over a fairly long period of time. Maybe by time it's done updating I'll have plans to go again!

summary: I threw some colors onto a Gym Mario doodle from last night cause I really liked how cartoony and appealing it turned out. (To...
caption:
I threw some colors onto a Gym Mario doodle from last night cause I really liked how cartoony and appealing it turned out. (To see my doodles and work in progress and get to know me better, follow my Twitter! https://twitter.com/_JeffPennington )

He’s here to inspire us all to hit the gym and then IMMEDIATELY ruin it completely with a bunch of pasta.

blog.name: mynintendonews
blog.title: My Nintendo News
blog.description: The latest Nintendo news 24/7

summary:
Video: Game History Secrets – “Nintendo Games That Were Almost Completely Different”

Did You Know Gaming? has released a new...
caption:
Video: Game History Secrets – “Nintendo Games That Were Almost Completely Different”

Did You Know Gaming? has released a new Game History Secrets episode, with Liam Robertson. In this video, “we talk about Nintendo games there almost completely different, including Animal Crossing Pocket Camp, Captain Toad’s Treasure Tracker, Project Hammer, Splatoon, and Tokyo Mirage Sessions. These games often started out in a different franchise, including Super Mario, Zelda, and even Pokemon”. Here’s the video.

reblog.comment:
Video: Game History Secrets – “Nintendo Games That Were Almost Completely Different”

These games often started out in a different franchise, including Super Mario, Zelda, and even Pokemon”. Here’s the video.

These games often started out in a different franchise, including Super Mario, Zelda, and even Pokemon”. Here’s the video.

summary: 🎮 ¿acaso nunca soñaste con una radio dedicada a la música de video juegos? Hoy tus sueños se hacen realidad, hoy tu niñez...
caption:
🎮 ¿acaso nunca soñaste con una radio dedicada a la música de video juegos? Hoy tus sueños se hacen realidad, hoy tu niñez vuelve, únicamente en tu emisora radial favorita Gamer Sound Radio. Escúchanos las 24 horas y los 7 días de la semana desde www.gamersoundradio.com o desde https://tunein.com/radio/Gamer-Sound-s250122/ también puedes sintonizar desde la App TuneIn para celulares totalmente gratis. 🔊  Ahora suena “Game Sync” del video juego  #PokemonXY compuesta por #ShotaKageyama  lanzada en el disco Pokémon X & Pokémon Y: Super Music Collection un 13 de noviembre del 2013.

blog.name: mynintendonews
blog.title: My Nintendo News
blog.description: The latest Nintendo news 24/7

summary: Nintendo Says The Labo VR Kit Is Only For Children Aged 7+
title: Nintendo Says The Labo VR Kit Is Only For Children Aged 7+
body:
Nintendo Says The Labo VR Kit Is Only For Children Aged 7+

Like the original Nintendo 3DS system, Nintendo has advised consumers on its Japanese website who are looking to purchase their upcoming Labo VR kit for the Nintendo Switch, that it should only be used by children aged 7+. No doubt that the same recommendation will be made by the company for the product over here in the west.

This advice comes from researchers, ophthalmology experts, and…

View On WordPress
